Name: Pixel World: Unity-Chan!
About the game: This is the action game that you color all of panels. The production is simple, but you can enjoy exhilarating actions by run the player and dash the enemy and spin them. You can enjoy various actions with the panel, lift them, throw them, use them as a shield, use them for glide, cut grass with them, use them for walk on the water, use them as a bombs. As the video shows, it is a characteristic game such as action that color by sandwich the same color's panel, defeat enemies by that, various actions by position of panels, production that rotates enemies, how to defeat the boss. There are five areas in total, and there are six stages in each area. Each area has a horizontal scroll stage, followed by a boss. Clear time is 1 hour to 2 hours. Since each stage has a variation, I think that you will feel interesting if you play until the end. You can also play local multi-play.
